                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • error: required(array of object)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A list of errors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Items: items

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • code: required(integer)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • level: required(integer)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • text: required(string)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • args: required(object)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          HTTP status code 401

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Authentication failure

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Body

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • error: required(array of object)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            A list of errors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Items: items

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • type: required(integer)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • code: required(integer)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • level: required(integer)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • args: required(object)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Examples:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            example1:

  "error": [
    {
      "type": 7,
      "code": 43,
      "text": "Invalid session ID.",
      "args": {},
      "level": 1
    }
  ]

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            example2:

  ]

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            HTTP status code 403

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            User is not allowed to access the requested resource.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Body

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Media type: application/json

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Type: object

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • error: required(array of object)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A list of errors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Items: items

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type: required(integer)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • code: required(integer)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • level: required(integer)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • text: required(string)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • args: required(object)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Example:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              {
  "error": [
    {
      "type": 7,
      "code": 47,
      "text": "Permission denied",
      "args": {},
      "level": 1
    }
  ]
}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Secured by token

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Headers

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Authorization: required(string)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Example:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Token 521a00e57d4a461b3e4bb0c55166f97c

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              put /system/external_endpoints/{id}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Update an external endpoint

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Secured by token

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Lighthouse base authentication scheme

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Request
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Response
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Security

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              URI Parameters

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • id: required(string)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Headers

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Authorization: required(string)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Example:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Token {{sessionUid}}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Media type: application/json

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Type: object

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Example:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              {
  "system_external_endpoint": {
    "id": "system_net_external_endpoints-1",
    "vpn_port": 1194,
    "mi_vpn_port": 1195,
    "api_port": 443,
    "address": "10.127.1.20"
  }
}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              HTTP status code 200

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Media type: application/json

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • address: required(string)

    "id": "system_net_external_endpoints-2",
    "vpn_port": 1196,

    "api_port": 4443,
    "address": "192.168.122.1"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              HTTP status code 400

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Body

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                A list of errors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                HTTP status code 401

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Authentication failure

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Body

    {
      "type": 7,
      "code": 43,
      "text": "Invalid session ID.",
      "args": {},
      "level": 1
    }
  ]
}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  HTTP status code 403

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  User is not allowed to modify the requested resource.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Body

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Media type: application/json

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Type: object

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • error: required(array of object)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    A list of errors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Items: items

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • type: required(integer)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • code: required(integer)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • level: required(integer)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • text: required(string)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • args: required(object)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Example:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    {
  "error": [
    {
      "type": 7,
      "code": 47,
      "text": "Permission denied",
      "args": {},
      "level": 1
    }
  ]
}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    HTTP status code 404

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Not found

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Body

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Media type: application/json

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      A list of errors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Items: items

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • level: required(integer)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • text: required(string)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • args: required(object)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      HTTP status code 500

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Internal error

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Body

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Media type: application/json

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Type: object

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • error: required(array of object)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        A list of errors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Items: items

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • type: required(integer)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • code: required(integer)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • level: required(integer)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • text: required(string)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • args: required(object)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Secured by token
